content:
ber 8, 2014
												At first glance, Galactic Bowling appears to be a whimsical casual bowling game with a sci-fi setting that could be a lot of fun. Upon actually playing it, the controls will make you want to throw your entire computer out the window. Whatever I paid for this, years ago, it was too much.

content:
, 2014
Graphics:They are s**t, the characters look blocky and the scenery has moderately-low rendered textures.3 reasons why this game is pointless to play:1. You can't play on your own WITHOUT an AI character. (If so, this game would've gotten a higher score, and a recommendation)2. The controls are broken to say the least.3. You can get a 300 EVERY SINGLE TIME! Due to the fact that the f**king bowling ball bounces off the pins for a dumb minigame, rather than going through them, like they were fricking supposed to!Final Verdict: 2/10 It only escapes being WORSE because i like bowling games.

2, 2014
												If you wanted to ruin a bowling game, this game is the definition to go by. First you add a horrible story, then horrible controls. With these two throw in changing physics that are mind boggling and maybe a few special abilities that are special in the sense you'd be a retard to use them. Don't buy this game unless you like to suffer.
